mapper.sql:
update AMF
ACC_BC = #{ACC_BC},
GMI_FLAG = #{GMI_FLAG},
DIV = NULL ,
DIV = #{DIV},
DEPT = NULL ,
DEPT = #{DEPT},
ACC_NO = #{ACC_NO},
CHQ_SRL = NULL ,
CHQ_SRL = #{CHQ_SRL},
BRIEF_NAME_ENG = #{BRIEF_NAME_ENG},
LONG_NAME_ENG = #{LONG_NAME_ENG},
BRIEF_NAME_ARAB = #{BRIEF_NAME_ARAB},
LONG_NAME_ARAB = #{LONG_NAME_ARAB},
